nodes.documentation:
This is the minting function used to distribute the tokens initially
 Once the minting is done, any future minting can be prevented by irrevocably setting 
 the mintable variable to "false".
nodes.name: mint

nodes.documentation:
@dev Getters for claims. Since keys cannot be deleted, they will be shown by showAllClaims() even if the claim was deleted.
@dev To check specific claim use showClaim()
nodes.name: showClaim
declareLost
resolveClaim

nodes.documentation: @dev This function is to be executed by the owener only in case a legal dispute needs to be settled.
nodes.name: deleteClaim

nodes.documentation: @dev This function is used to remove all claims on an address after claims have been resolved.
nodes.name: deleteAllClaims
